channel.title: Posts on A Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Blog

item.title: Using Travis-CI to Build Blogdown
item.description: create repo on github git init git remote add origin git@github.com:nealrichardson/nealrichardson.github.io.git https://travis-ci.org/profile, enable git checkout -b src (because it’s a user page, not repo page) .gitignore .travis.yml DESCRIPTION generate key gem install travis travis encrypt –add (can’t do until you’ve enabled Travis on your repository and have git remote add origin) https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown/issues/26 https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/github.html https://github.com/curso-r/verao2017/blob/master/.travis.yml

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
